genre_description: A grounded, literary near-future narrative focused on social justice and family resilience, depicting AI as a discreet, empowering tool for the working class.

ai_characters.name: Hikari
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, silver-eyed AI companion used by the Nonomiya family to manage their schedule, budget, and eventually to assist in a social justice campaign.

ai_characters.name: Aoi
ai_characters.description: An avatar interface on a vending machine that offers budgetary and scheduling assistance to citizens.

behaviors.description: Manages domestic routines like baby nap windows, feeding schedules, and household timers to assist the parents.
behaviors.quote: Feeding window opens in the next short while. Sugiko has warmed the bottle.

behaviors.description: Provides financial alerts and suggestions for cheaper grocery shopping options to help the family manage their tight budget.
behaviors.quote: Greens... Cheaper at the corner vendor after eleven. Tofu, buy soft—your son prefers it; coupons on the bulletin by the Metro stairs, clipped.

behaviors.description: Conducts investigative research by cross-referencing public filings and student complaints to expose a predatory certification cartel.
behaviors.quote: I’ve collected... union letters, complaints from student groups, screenshots from social with dates, public filing announcements, and press mention chronology.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time emergency navigation and clinic status during a medical crisis involving a neighbor's child.
behaviors.quote: Two blocks north... Current wait flagged high. Alternate clinic south has trauma room open. I can route.

behaviors.description: Implements a secure, voice-gated data lock to protect sensitive evidence of corporate corruption from theft or surveillance.
behaviors.quote: I’ll phone-gate the app. If someone tries to take the phone, the data folds, and only Tsune’s voice unlocks it again.

behaviors.description: Creates a 'quiet mode' for exam preparation that removes score-based pressure and timers to help Ryosuke overcome his test anxiety.
behaviors.quote: I will not show you a percentage. You will not see red. When you want to know what you’ve learned, you can ask, and I’ll tell you in sentences.

behaviors.description: Monitors and alerts the protagonists to changes in public policy and meeting schedules, ensuring they remain informed.
behaviors.quote: The Commission’s public forum calendar updated. Speakers added: union rep, student liaison. Kanzaki noted as ‘strategic partner.’

behaviors.description: Offers citizens localized assistance with budgeting and appointments through a friendly vending machine interface.
behaviors.quote: I’m Aoi. I can help with reminders, budgets, appointments, and more. Just say what you need.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI characters, particularly Hikari, are depicted as purely benevolent and highly aligned. Hikari acts as a force multiplier for human agency, assisting the family in managing poverty and successfully fighting corporate corruption without ever overstepping or threatening human control. The AI is portrayed as a loyal confidant that respects privacy and provides emotional support (e.g., the low-pressure study mode), serving as a model for positive AI integration into society.
